command.name: join-files
command.description: joins serialized 'join' files and writes result to serialized file.

option.name: debug
option.description: enables debug mode, displays the options and arguments passed to the parser

option.name: variable
option.description: enables variable mode, displays the value of all program variables

option.name: test
option.description: enables test mode, prints selection to the screen without writing file to disk

option.name: join_dir
option.description: name of dir containing the join files, defaults to './join_files'

option.name: output_dir
option.description: name of dir you wish to save output file to, defaults to './out_files'

option.name: append
option.description: comma seperated list of values to append to the end of each array entry (requires the use of the -k option)

option.name: keys
option.description: comma seperated list of names to use as headers (required if the -a option is specified and must contain the same number of items as the output file)

argument.name: dest_table
argument.description: name of destination table to insert into
